h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
h3_title: 3\. It’s Really Easy to Reset Your Skills
content: Once you defeat a boss at the end of a chapter and earn one of the Six Relics of the Great Sage, you'll be given the option to awaken a single passive talent. These can also be reset in the Reignite the Sparks Menu, but you'll need to select the correct tab for Relics!

The content is as follows:
Once you defeat a boss at the end of a chapter and earn one of the Six Relics of the Great Sage, you'll be given the option to awaken a single passive talent. These can also be reset in the Reignite the Sparks Menu, but you'll need to select the correct tab for Relics!
